languages.text: "Хочу родной корабль верою напитать, чтоб люди повсюду присутствие Бога нашего Императора чувствовали. Так и им спокойнее будет, и работа ударнее пойдет. Я отметил, где на палубах бы автоматические часовни поставить, а где — {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-передатчики{/g} установить для трансляции богослужений". {n}Мужчина достает инфопластину с картой корабля и увлеченно комментирует отметки.{/n}

"I want to infuse my home vessel with faith, so that people may feel the presence of the God-Emperor wherever they go. This will make them feel at ease, and the work will be done with greater effort. I've already indicated where best to place automatic chapels on the decks, and where to install {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-casters{/g} for liturgical sermons." {n}He produces a data-slate showing a map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Хочу родной корабль верою напитать, чтоб люди повсюду присутствие Бога нашего Императора чувствовали. Так и им спокойнее будет, и работа ударнее пойдет. Я отметил, где на палубах бы автоматические часовни поставить, а где — {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-передатчики{/g} установить для трансляции богослужений". {n}Мужчина достает инфопластину с картой корабля и увлеченно комментирует отметки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I want to infuse my home vessel with faith, so that people can feel the presence of our God, the Almighty Emperor wherever they go. This will make them feel at ease, and the work will be done with greater effort. I noted where to put automatic chapels on decks, and where to install vox-transmitters for broadcasting liturgical sermons." {n}The man produces a data-slate showing the map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}

I noted where to put automatic chapels on decks, and where to install vox-transmitters for broadcasting liturgical sermons." {n}The man produces a data-slate showing the map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}

I've already indicated where best to place automatic chapels on the decks, and where to install {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-casters{/g} for liturgical sermons." {n}He produces a data-slate showing a map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich will mein Heimatschiff mit Glauben erfüllen, damit die Leute die Präsenz des Gottimperators überall spüren. Das wird sie entspannen, und sie können bei der Arbeit mehr Leistung bringen. Ich habe schon Ideen, wo ich auf den Decks automatische Kapellen aufstellen würde, und wo {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Transmitter{/g} für liturgische Predigten." {n}Er holt einen Datablock mit einer Karte des Schiffs hervor und zeigt aufgeregt auf die Markierungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I want to infuse my home vessel with faith, so that people may feel the presence of the God-Emperor wherever they go. This will make them feel at ease, and the work will be done with greater effort. I've already indicated where best to place automatic chapels on the decks, and where to install {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-casters{/g} for liturgical sermons." {n}He produces a data-slate showing a map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}

Ich habe schon Ideen, wo ich auf den Decks automatische Kapellen aufstellen würde, und wo Vox-Transmitter für liturgische Predigten." {n}Er holt einen Datablock mit einer Karte des Schiffs hervor und zeigt aufgeregt auf die Markierungen.{/n}

languages.text: «Quiero impregnar de fe mi navío natal para que sus habitantes perciban la presencia del Dios Emperador dondequiera que vayan. Esto les reconfortará y podrán desempeñar sus labores con mayor denuedo. Ya he señalado las mejores ubicaciones de las cubiertas donde instalar capillas automáticas y {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco amplificadores{/g} para los sermones litúrgicos». {n}Extrae una tablilla de datos en la que se ve un plano de la nave y señala muy entusiasmado diversos puntos en él.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I want to infuse my home vessel with faith, so that people may feel the presence of the God-Emperor wherever they go. This will make them feel at ease, and the work will be done with greater effort. I've already indicated where best to place automatic chapels on the decks, and where to install {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-casters{/g} for liturgical sermons." {n}He produces a data-slate showing a map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Quiero impregnar de fe mi navío natal para que sus habitantes perciban la presencia del Dios Emperador dondequiera que vayan. Esto les reconfortará y podrán desempeñar sus labores con mayor denuedo. Ya he señalado las mejores ubicaciones de las cubiertas donde instalar capillas automáticas y voco amplificadores para los sermones litúrgicos». {n}Extrae una tablilla de datos en la que se ve un plano de la nave y señala muy entusiasmado diversos puntos en él.{/n}

languages.text: 「うちの船に信仰を植え付けて、人々がどこに行っても神帝陛下の存在を感じられるようにしたいです。そうすればみんなは安心して、仕事もはかどることでしょう。すでにデッキで一番いい、自動礼拝堂の設置場所と、典礼説教用の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}の設置場所は話してありますよ」{n}男は船内の地図を示したデータスレートを出し、興奮気味にマークを指さした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I want to infuse my home vessel with faith, so that people may feel the presence of the God-Emperor wherever they go. This will make them feel at ease, and the work will be done with greater effort. I've already indicated where best to place automatic chapels on the decks, and where to install {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-casters{/g} for liturgical sermons." {n}He produces a data-slate showing a map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「うちの船に信仰を植え付けて、人々がどこに行っても神帝陛下の存在を感じられるようにしたいです。そうすればみんなは安心して、仕事もはかどることでしょう。すでにデッキで一番いい、自動礼拝堂の設置場所と、典礼説教用の音声通信送受信装置の設置場所は話してありますよ」{n}男は船内の地図を示したデータスレートを出し、興奮気味にマークを指さした。{/n}

languages.text: “我想让我的故乡、让这艘船充满信仰的力量，让人们无论走到哪里，都能感受到神皇的存在。这会让人们感到轻松，也会让他们更加努力完成工作。我已经找到了这艘船上最适合布置自动礼拜堂和布道{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯器{/g}的位置。”{n}他取出数据板，上面显示着这艘船的平面图，兴奋地指着上面的标记。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I want to infuse my home vessel with faith, so that people may feel the presence of the God-Emperor wherever they go. This will make them feel at ease, and the work will be done with greater effort. I've already indicated where best to place automatic chapels on the decks, and where to install {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-casters{/g} for liturgical sermons." {n}He produces a data-slate showing a map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我想让我的故乡、让这艘船充满信仰的力量，让人们无论走到哪里，都能感受到神皇的存在。这会让人们感到轻松，也会让他们更加努力完成工作。我已经找到了这艘船上最适合布置自动礼拜堂和布道通讯器的位置。”{n}他取出数据板，上面显示着这艘船的平面图，兴奋地指着上面的标记。{/n}

languages.text: « Je tiens avant tout à imprégner ce vaisseau de saine piété, pour que ses occupants ressentent la présence de l'Empereur-Dieu où qu'ils aillent. Ainsi rassurés, ils accompliront leur travail avec une ardeur redoublée. J'ai déjà suggéré plusieurs endroits sur les ponts où placer des chapelles automatiques et des {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}émetteurs-vox{/g} afin de diffuser les offices liturgiques. » {n}Il sort une plaque de données sur laquelle figure un plan du vaisseau et désigne les repères correspondants avec excitation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I want to infuse my home vessel with faith, so that people may feel the presence of the God-Emperor wherever they go. This will make them feel at ease, and the work will be done with greater effort. I've already indicated where best to place automatic chapels on the decks, and where to install {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-casters{/g} for liturgical sermons." {n}He produces a data-slate showing a map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}

languages.text: "Evim olan bu gemiye inanç aşılamak istiyorum, böylece insanlar nereye giderlerse gitsinler Tanrı İmparator'un mevcudiyetini hissedebilirler. Böylece daha huzurlu olurlar ve işlerini daha büyük bir eforla yapabilirler. Güvertelerde otomatik şapellerin yerleştirilebileceği ve ayin vaazları için {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksyayarların{/g} kurulabileceği en iyi yerleri belirledim bile." {n}Geminin bir haritasını gösteren bir databela çıkarıyor ve işaretleri heyecanla gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I want to infuse my home vessel with faith, so that people may feel the presence of the God-Emperor wherever they go. This will make them feel at ease, and the work will be done with greater effort. I've already indicated where best to place automatic chapels on the decks, and where to install {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-casters{/g} for liturgical sermons." {n}He produces a data-slate showing a map of the ship and points at the marks excitedly.{/n}
